com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers

Class LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation.DelegatingCompositeHandlerBase
      • com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientHandler, IHTTPConnectionHandler, ISOAPMessageHandler, Handler<SOAPMessageContext>, SOAPHandler<SOAPMessageContext>

    public final class LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler
extends com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation.DelegatingCompositeHandlerBase
    A handler that adds HTTP headers that contain locale and time zone information to the requests that clients make to the i2 Analyze web service.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler()
      Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the locale and time zone of the client.
      LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler(Locale locale, TimeZone timeZone)
      Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the specified Locale and TimeZone.
      LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler(String localeCode, String timeZoneId)
      Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the locale and time zone with the specified identifiers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler

        public LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler()
        Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the locale and time zone of the client.

      • LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler

        public LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler(Locale locale,
                                TimeZone timeZone)
        Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the specified Locale and TimeZone.
        Parameters:
        locale - The Locale to use, or null to use the locale of the client (Locale.getDefault()).
        timeZone - The TimeZone to use, or null to use the time zone of the client (Calendar.getTimeZone()).

      • LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler

        public LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler(String localeCode,
                                String timeZoneId)
        Constructs a new LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler that uses the locale and time zone with the specified identifiers.
        Parameters:
        localeCode - A String containing the two-part code for the locale (for example, "en-us"), or null to use the locale of the client (Locale.getDefault()).
        timeZoneId - A String containing the identifier of the time zone (for example, "Europe/London"), or null to use the time zone of the client (Calendar.getTimeZone()).
